text: (he ahle kitaab!) kya tum kahate ho ki ibraaheem, ismaeel, ishî€¼aaq, yaaqoob tatha unakee santaan yahoodee ya eesaee thee? unase kah do ki tum adhik jaanate ho athava allaah? aur usase bada atyaachaaree kaun hoga, jisake paas allaah ka saakshy ho aur use chhupa de? aur allaah tumhaare karatooton se achet to nahin hai
